#summary More info on building CalDAV4j

=Building CalDAV4j=

== Get Maven 2.x ==

[http://maven.apache.org/download.html Download] and install the latest version of the Maven build tool.

== Get the source ==

Checkout the CalDAV4j [http://code.google.com/p/caldav4j/source source] code.

== Build without Tests ==

From within the source tree run:

mvn -Dmaven.test.skip=true package
